description.narrative: Latin America Paint Corporation (LAPCO or the Company) is a holding company that owns paint manufacturing and distribution units in Central America. The proposed investment will modernize and expand the existing manufacturing operations in Guatemala and strengthen the distribution network in the Central American region.

name.narrative:
The site of the paint factory is located in the town of Escuintla, Guatemala about 60 kilometers from the capital of Guatemala. The site is well connected by road, and is located in an industrial zone.
The project also involves strengthening the distribution network by developing additional warehouses in Central America, starting in Honduras and Nicaragua.
